verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H5358>Avenge<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> of the <S%H4084>Midianites<s%>: <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall you be <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto your <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2502>Arm<s%> <S%H582>some<s%> of yourselves unto the <S%H6635>war<s%>, and let them go against the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>, and <S%H5414>avenge<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.
Of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, throughout all the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall you <S%H7971>send<s%> to the <S%H6635>war<s%>.

So there were <S%H4560>delivered<s%> out of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%>, <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them to the <S%H6635>war<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%>, them and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, to the <S%H6635>war<s%>, with the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%>, and the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> to <S%H8643>blow<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And they <S%H6633>warred<s%> against the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; and they <S%H2026>killed<s%> all the <S%H2145>males<s%>.

And they <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H5921>beside<s%> the rest of them that were <S%H2491>slain<s%>; <S%H189>namely<s%>, Evi, and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%>, and <S%H6698>Zur<s%>, and <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, and <S%H7254>Reba<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>: <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> they <S%H2026>killed<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took all the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H7617>captives<s%>, and their little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and took the <S%H962>plunder<s%> of all their <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and all their <S%H4735>flocks<s%>, and all their <S%H2428>goods<s%>.
And they <S%H8313>burnt<s%> all their <S%H5892>cities<s%> where they <S%H4186>lived<s%>, and all their good <S%H2918>castles<s%>, with <S%H784>fire<s%>.
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H7998>plunder<s%>, and all the <S%H4455>prey<s%>, both of <S%H120>men<s%> and of <S%H929>animals<s%>.

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7628>captives<s%>, and the <S%H4455>prey<s%>, and the <S%H7998>plunder<s%>, unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and unto the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, which are by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with the <S%H6485>officers<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%>, with the <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, which <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6635>from<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2421>them<s%>, Have you saved all the <S%H5347>women<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>?

<S%H2007>Behold<s%>, these <S%H1961>caused<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, through the <S%H1697>counsel<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, to <S%H4560>commit<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%>, and there was a <S%H4046>plague<s%> among the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H2026>kill<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and <S%H2026>kill<s%> every <S%H802>woman<s%> that has <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with <S%H2145>him<s%>.
But all the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H2945>children<s%>, that have not <S%H3045>known<s%> a <S%H2145>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with <S%H2421>him<s%>, keep alive for yourselves.

And do you <S%H2583>stay<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: whoever has <S%H2026>killed<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%>, and whoever has <S%H5060>touched<s%> any <S%H2491>slain<s%>, <S%H2398>purify<s%> both yourselves and your <S%H7628>captives<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H2398>purify<s%> all your <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and all that is <S%H3627>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skins<s%>, and all <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' <S%H3627>hair<s%>, and all things made of <S%H6086>wood<s%>.

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> which <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, This is the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>;
Only the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, the <S%H5178>brass<s%>, the <S%H1270>iron<s%>, the <S%H913>tin<s%>, and the <S%H5777>lead<s%>,

Every <S%H1697>thing<s%> that may <S%H935>survive<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, you shall make it go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and it shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>: nevertheless it shall be <S%H2398>purified<s%> with the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5079>separation<s%>: and all that <S%H935>survives<s%> not the <S%H784>fire<s%> you shall make go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> your <S%H899>clothes<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and you shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H5375>Take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H4455>prey<s%> that was <S%H7628>taken<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animal<s%>, <S%H499>you<s%>, and Eleazar the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>:

And <S%H2673>divide<s%> the <S%H4455>prey<s%> into two <S%H2673>parts<s%>; between them that <S%H8610>took<s%> the <S%H4421>war<s%> upon <S%H3318>them<s%>, who went out to <S%H6635>battle<s%>, and between all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>:

And <S%H7311>levy<s%> a <S%H4371>tribute<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> which went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>battle<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, both of the <S%H120>persons<s%>, and of the <S%H1241>cattle<s%>, and of the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, and of the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>:
<S%H3947>Take<s%> it of their <S%H4276>half<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, for an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half<s%>, you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>portion<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, of the <S%H120>persons<s%>, of the <S%H1241>cattle<s%>, of the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, and of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, of all manner of <S%H929>animals<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, which <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And the <S%H4455>booty<s%>, being the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H957>prey<s%> which the men <S%H5971>of<s%> <S%H6635>war<s%> had <S%H962>caught<s%>, was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>,
And sixty and <S%H7657>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>cattle<s%>,
And <S%H8346>sixty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>,

And <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%>, of <S%H802>women<s%> that had not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> by lying with <S%H4904>him<s%>.

And the <S%H4275>half<s%>, which was the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of them that went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>, was in <S%H4557>number<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>:
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and sixty and <S%H7657>fifteen<s%>.
And the <S%H1241>cattle<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>; of which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was sixty and <S%H7657>twelve<s%>.

And the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>; of which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was <S%H8346>sixty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%>.
And the <S%H120>persons<s%> were <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>; of which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4371>tribute<s%>, which was the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s heave <S%H8641>offering<s%>, unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2673>divided<s%> from the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H6633>warred<s%>,

(Now the <S%H4275>half<s%> that pertained unto the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967%H99999>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>,
And <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>cattle<s%>,
And <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>,
And <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%>;)

Even of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>portion<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animal<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, which <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And the <S%H6485>officers<s%> which were over <S%H505>thousands<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>, the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>:

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5375>taken<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> which are under our <S%H3027>charge<s%>, and there <S%H6485>lacks<s%> not one man of <S%H376>us<s%>.

We have therefore <S%H7126>brought<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, what every <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H4672>gotten<s%>, of <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H685>chains<s%>, and <S%H6781>bracelets<s%>, <S%H2885>rings<s%>, <S%H5694>earrings<s%>, and <S%H3558>tablets<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for our <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H4639>them<s%>, even all worked <S%H3627>jewels<s%>.

And all the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8641>offering<s%> that they offered <S%H7311>up<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, was <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>.
(For the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> had taken <S%H962>plunder<s%>, every man for <S%H376>himself<s%>.)

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
